about_the_game:
Welcome to Quecksilber, the ultimate future-sports game where ruthless aggression and brutal tactics are just as important as speed and skill!


In this blend of soccer, football and hockey, you'll lead your team of high-tech gladiators into the arena and battle it out with rival teams in a fast-paced, action-packed game of strategy and mayhem.

Whether you're retro gamer or a newcomer to the world of futuristic sports, Quecksilber offers an addictive and thrilling experience that will keep you coming back for more.

With its immersive graphics, pulse-pounding soundtrack, and intuitive controls, Quecksilber is the ultimate adrenaline rush for fans of fast-paced sports games.
Choose your team, customize your players, and dominate the competition as you climb the ranks and become the ultimate Quecksilber champion.



Powered by a custom-made physics engine, Quecksilber offers accurate, blazingly-fast and fun ball physics.

They are both fun and enjoyable, creating an immersive and engaging experience that will keep you coming back for more. From the way the ball bounces off walls to the way it interacts with players and objects in the arena, every aspect of Quecksilber's ball physics has been carefully crafted to deliver an experience that is both intuitive and rewarding.

Whether you're playing solo or with friends, the ball physics make for a dynamic and exciting gameplay experience.

With responsive and realistic movement, you'll feel like you're really in control of the ball, whether you're dribbling past defenders, sending a pass to your striker or scoring a sensational goal.



Quecksilber's AI is powered by advanced algorithms that enable it to analyze the game environment in real-time, taking into account variables such as the position of the ball, its trajectory, the location of the players, and even the current score. This allows it to make split-second decisions that are both intelligent and realistic, creating a dynamic and challenging gameplay experience.

Enjoy smart and life-like opponents, teammates and goalkeepers.



Here's a list of 🚧 planned features (no promises!) and those already available:

Smooth (60fps+) gameplay. The game offers smooth, fast and fluid gameplay.

Accurate & fun ball physics. I put great effort in developing a custom physics engine for the game, for maximum fun.

Local Multiplayer. Play pvp or coop with up to 4 players.

🚧 Online Multiplayer. Play online matches. (If I can pull it off, this will be based on custom network code for minimal lack instead of Steam Remote Play.)

🚧 Sticky controls. Assign controllers to single players instead of player switching. Massive fun especially with co-op!

🚧 Cup & League modes. Instead of single matches only, play a league or cup season.

🚧 Player skills. Individual player skills like speed, stamina, control etc. Probably upgradable during a season.

🚧 Linux & Mac support. The game should not only be available natively for Windows, but also for Mac and Linux - it's a perfect match for the Steam Deck, imo!

Notes from the Developer


👩‍💻 Quecksilber is made by a single developer, me, Thorsten - nice to meet you! 👋

⚽ It is based on a complete rewrite of my first self-published game - Natural Soccer - and heavily inspired by Speedball, Kick Off, NHL and other games I liked to play as a kid on my Amiga.

💡 “Quecksilber” is the German word for “mercury”, which describes perfectly both the metallic look of the game, and its quick, smooth and fluid gameplay.

🕹 I really hope you'll enjoy playing Quecksilber - thanks a lot for your support!

👉 WISHLIST NOW!
